<script type="text/javascript">
    var aautClientId = "ap";
    var aautHostConfig = "prod.USAmazon";
    var aautSessionId = "146-1421385-4112468";
    var aautMarketplaceId = "ATVPDKIKX0DER";
    var aautRid = "CRYPZQ2YB141BVWKH3Z6";
    var aautUbid = "135-4298433-5683932";
    var aautLocale = "zh_CN";
    var aautExternalToken = "e133af7e-2b0c-4ae5-a7b5-037a61bbc113";
    var aautPageType = "UnifiedAuthClaimCollection"
    var eventTriggerPageLoad = "PageLoad";
    var eventTriggerSubmitInput = "SubmitInput";
    var unifiedClaimCollectionEmailInputId = "ap_email_login";

    var acicActionType = false;

    var pageLoadTime;
    window.onload = function() {
        pageLoadTime = Date.now();
    };

    P.when("authx-claim-collection-validation", "acic-component", "ready").execute('acic-setup', function(authxValidator) {

        var aautTargetForm = document.querySelector('form[name="signIn"]');

        setAAToken(aautExternalToken, aautTargetForm);

        if ((typeof acic !== 'undefined') && (acic != null)) {
            acic.setupACIC({
                "data-mode": "1", 
                "data-ref-id": aautClientId,
                "data-context": getClientContext(aautTargetForm),
                "data-callback": function(data) {
                    if (data.actionType && data.actionType !== "PASS") {
                        acicActionType = true;
                    }
                },
                "data-host-config": aautHostConfig,
                "data-event-trigger": eventTriggerPageLoad,
                "data-aa-external-token" : aautExternalToken
            });
        }
        var submitInput = aautTargetForm.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
        if (submitInput) {
            submitInput.addEventListener("click", function(event) {
                acicEventListener(authxValidator, aautTargetForm, submitInput, event);
            });
        }
    });

    var acicShouldSetup = true;

    function acicEventListener(authxValidator, aautTargetForm, submitInput, event) {
        
        
        var submitButtonClickTime = Date.now();
        var validate = authxValidator.validate();
        if (acicShouldSetup &&
            (typeof acic !== 'undefined') && (acic != null) && validate.validClaim) {
            if (acicActionType || isTestEmailPattern(getEmailAddress())) {

                event.stopPropagation();
                event.stopImmediatePropagation();
                event.preventDefault();

                acic.setupACIC({
                    "data-ref-id": aautClientId,
                    "data-context": getClientContext(aautTargetForm, submitButtonClickTime),
                    "data-callback": function(data) {
                        submitForm(submitInput);
                    },
                    "data-locale": aautLocale,
                    "data-host-config": aautHostConfig,
                    "data-event-trigger": eventTriggerSubmitInput,
                    "data-aa-external-token" : aautExternalToken,
                    "data-use-post-request-method": true,
                    "data-fwcim": getFwcimBlob(aautTargetForm)
                });
            } else {
                acic.setupACICforAsyncReporting({
                    "data-ref-id": aautClientId,
                    "data-context": getClientContext(aautTargetForm, submitButtonClickTime),
                    "data-callback": function(data) {},
                    "data-host-config": aautHostConfig,
                    "data-event-trigger": eventTriggerSubmitInput,
                    "data-aa-external-token" : aautExternalToken,
                    "data-fwcim": getFwcimBlob(aautTargetForm)
                });
            }
        }
    }

    function submitForm(submitInput) {
        acicShouldSetup = false;
        submitInput.click();
    }

    function setAAToken(sessionToken, aautTargetForm) {
        if (sessionToken) {
            var aaTokenInput = aautTargetForm.querySelector("input[name='aaToken']");
            if (!aaTokenInput) {
                aaTokenInput = document.createElement("input");
                aaTokenInput.type = "hidden";
                aaTokenInput.name = "aaToken";
                aautTargetForm.appendChild(aaTokenInput);
            }
            aaTokenInput.value = sessionToken;
        }
    }

    function getClientContext(aautTargetForm, submitButtonClickTime) {
        var context = {};

        if (pageLoadTime && submitButtonClickTime) {
            context.loadAndSubmitTimeDelta = (submitButtonClickTime - pageLoadTime).toString();
        }

        var emailAddress = getEmailAddress();
        if (emailAddress) {
            context.emailAddress = emailAddress;
        }
        context.sessionId = aautSessionId;
        context.marketplaceId = aautMarketplaceId;
        context.rid = aautRid;
        context.ubid = aautUbid;

        context.pageType = aautPageType;

        var appActionInput = aautTargetForm.querySelector("input[name='appAction']");
        if (appActionInput) {
            context.appAction = appActionInput.value;
        }

        var subPageTypeInput = aautTargetForm.querySelector("input[name='subPageType']");
        if (subPageTypeInput) {
            context.subPageType = subPageTypeInput.value;
        }

        return JSON.stringify(context);
    }

    function getEmailAddress() {
        var emailInput = document.getElementById(unifiedClaimCollectionEmailInputId);
        if (emailInput) {
            return emailInput.value;
        }
        return null;
    }

    function isTestEmailPattern(emailAddress) {
        
        return emailAddress &&
            (emailAddress.indexOf('sentinels') >= 0) &&
            emailAddress.endsWith('@amazon.com');
    }

    function getFwcimBlob(aautTargetForm) {
        var fwcimBlob = aautTargetForm.querySelector("input[name='metadata1']");
        if(fwcimBlob && fwcimBlob.value !== 'true') {
            return fwcimBlob.value;
        }
        return null;
    }

</script>
